mapper.insert: insert into item (category, naming, price, seller, stock, info, regdate) values (#{category},#{naming},#{price},#{seller},#{stock},#{info},sysdate());
mapper.select:
select* from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, ino, category, naming, price,seller, stock, info, regdate from (select @rownum:=0) as rownum , item order by ino desc ) pageboard
where rownum>(#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount} and rownum<= #{pageNum}*#{amount}
